attributes.action: Deaf & BSL Module should be in all professional (Social Work, Teacher, Youth Work, Medical, Police,etc) courses programme & criteria, include UN Convention of Human Rights for People with Disabilities.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Deaf & BSL Module should be in all professional (Social Work, Teacher, Youth Work, Medical, Police, etc) course programme & criteria, includes UN Convention of Human Rights for People with Disabilities, then professional people’ll able to change Deaf people’s life more and much better because of professional worker’s understandable of how to work with them, e.g. aware of their communication and Deaf Identify Needs, no judgments and discrimination against their Disability, etc meanwhile will able to save the funds, less stress and responsibility at work environments and Customers/clients/patients, etc, which will give people with Deaf empowerment, confidence, assertive, problem-solve, develop their Deaf Identify Needs, reduce crime/Mental Health/family problem and independence, which will guidance them ahead for their future ambitions or either live with their own way of good/positive/successful life. Without this Module in Professional course, etc, the situation will be stay the same.
